column2: "Wow, amazing, amazing! Someone that huge got beaten, huh?"
"Everyone did it, huh? They did better than I thought, huh? That's great, amazing, amazing!"
"Then, I want you to show me something even moooore amazing!"
"Otherwise, it'll be too boring, you know?"
"They're coming again...! Kotoshiro, is there a way to escape..."
"...To protect the Miko's shrine. That is the Keeper's duty. You, however, should escape."
"Uuh, even if you say that... ...You too, right?"
"Okay, okay, then let's..."
"Let's continue... ...nnnn? Huh?"
"This is, ash wind!"

"...Goodness, really! It's so noisy I
can't even catch a quick afternoon nap."
"White or black, you are so persistent in fighting each other. It's almost commendable."
"Fuuaaah... well, when they gather, they do so en masse. Is there perhaps a banquet?"
"Unfortunately, I am not in the mood for that. I'll humor you some other day!"
"You wiped out that entire army? Dark Falz, everything..."
"Kaka! I didn't wipe them out. I merely returned them somewhere. Well, they should be in the Kuronian nation about now."
"Kotoshiro, oh Kotoshiro... Why did this fool not escape?"
"If it were just you it would be a different story; involving our guests was stupid."
"...I have no excuses."
"...Kaaaaaah, so boring and stubborn! Argue back a bit."
"In that case, if you came back and the shrine was no longer here, what would you do?"
"Kaka! Isn't that obvious? Kotoshiro, I shall smack you."
"Thus, I kept protecting it."
"Are you afraid of my fist?"
"If it can crush planets, definitely."
"Don't joke like that. I have taken a liking to this planet. Why would I destroy something I like?"
"At the very least, I will give you praise for protecting my shrine, Kotoshiro."
"Oops, that's right, that's right. I must greet our guests."
"My thanks. I appreciate your help, <%me>. You too, Matoi."
"Uh, how do you know our names...?"
"Kaka! I know at least this much. I am not a Miko simply for show."
"Once again, I graciously give these guests my thanks."
"I, am Sukunahime. I known as the Ashen Miko. Pleasure to make your acquaintance."
"The Ashen Miko, Sukunahime... p-pleased to meet you."
"Kaka! No need for formalities. You are my benefactor. Isn't that so, Kotoshiro?"
"...I too, thank you for your cooperation. It is due to your efforts that I was able to protect these grounds."
"So, I believe I shall now take another nap within the shrine that you have protected."
"Please hold, Sukunahime. About the disputes around Harukotan..."
"I do not wait for unpleasant things to happen. I am tired, and thus, I will sleep now."
"...Excuse me. I was unsightly."
"Ah, y-yep."
"1. ...Looks tough."
"2. That's the [Miko-sama]?"
"...Thank you for understanding so swiftly."
"I know what you want to say. But, please refrain from saying it. I am...the Miko's Keeper after all."
"Where The Gray Goddess Dance"
"1章 灰の神子は何処に舞う"
